newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-VERONA COACH CAGNI EXTENDS CONTRACT.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-VERONA COACH CAGNI EXTENDS CONTRACT.

text.p: Luigi Cagni, coach of relegation-threatened serie A club Verona, will stay on for another season, the club said on Thursday.
Verona were Italian champions in 1984-85 but are currently second from bottom in the league.
"We will try to start up a new cycle," Cagni said. "I don't want to hear about serie B. I say that these five matches will be decisive."
Verona, with 26 points from 29 games, play leaders Juventus at home on Sunday after beating Napoli last weekend.
